data.description: Perl Server Pages, generic HTML embedding
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is the basis module for Apache::PSP. Please see the rationale
    for that module for history and details.

    Template::PSP is a generic PSP compiler which takes a PSP page and
    returns a function reference. The reference can be used in a CGI,
    mod_perl, or other context to produce dynamic HTML or XML output.

    My plans for this module include mod_perl, CGI, and e-mail
    auto-responder interfaces.
